Data Fields
am_hal_uart_stream_data_config_t Struct Reference
mcu » apollo330P » UART Stream Functionality

Detailed Description

This is used to configure tx and rx parameters it can be const, this is read-only

#include <am_hal_uart_stream.h>

 can be const, struct containing tx setup params

 the dma mode used for this uart
